venue.address_2: ( 1 block from Kenmore Square toward Brookline)
venue.name: RISQUE at An Tua Nua

item.why: The Boston Bachata Meetup Group are having a meetup on Wed. night at An Tua Nua, 835 Beacon St. Bachata and salsa lessons from 8:30-10pm for $13. I've never tried bachata before but I'm told that it's easier than salsa for newbies like me.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Bachata and salsa on Wed. night at Ana Tua Nua (1 year anniversary celebration).
